subtitle: Serve on a bed of noodles.

method.text: Season the chicken by rubbing a little salt into the skin. Lightly prick all over with a skewer.
Pour over the sherry and soy sauce and toss to coat well.
Heat half the oil in a large frying pan. Add the garlic and ginger. Fry for 2 min.
Add half the chicken drumsticks. Stir fry for 8-10 min, turning constantly until well browned all over, Remove from pan and set aside whilst frying the remainder of the drumsticks in the sesame oil.
Return all the chicken to the pan. Stir in the salad onions, honey, cucumber and sesame seeds. Stir fry until piping hot. Serve immediately.

title: Oriental style chicken with salad onions
